FuncDef:
The ipv4-family command enables the IPv4 address family for a VPN instance and displays the VPN instance IPv4 address family view.
The undo ipv4-family command disables the IPv4 address family for a VPN instance. The ipv4-family command enables the IPv4 address family for a VPN instance and displays the VPN instance IPv4 address family view. The undo ipv4-family command disables the IPv4 address family for a VPN instance. By default, the IPv4 address family is not enabled for a VPN instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the unicast address family view.
-

ExtraInfo: In L3VPN networking, after you run the ip vpn-instance command to create a VPN instance, you can run the ipv4-family command to enable the IPv4 address family for the VPN instance and perform VPN configurations in the address family view if you want to have IPv4 VPN routes advertised and IPv4 VPN data forwarded.
